name: Stewed Squid In Tomato Sauce
keywords: dry white wine, squid, tomato, low-carb, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 cup canned Italian plum tomatoes chopped, with their juice
2 pounds squid, cleaned and sliced (see above)
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Gently saute the onion and the garlic in the olive oil. Add the tomatoes and white wine and simmer for five minutes.
Add the squid, thyme, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer gently for 30 to 40 minutes or until the squid is tender. Correct seasoning and serve.
